Vulnerability.Description: Mercurial is a fast, lightweight source control management system designed for efficient handling of very large distributed projects. Security Fix(es): * A flaw was found in the way "hg serve --stdio" command in Mercurial handled command-line options. A remote, authenticated attacker could use this flaw to execute arbitrary code on the Mercurial server by using specially crafted command-line options. (CVE-2017-9462)
Vulnerability.Name: RHSA-2017:1576
